column1: No, no, that's not how you uphold the law!
Oohhh, ohh, you've got it all wrong, my little friend. You do it like this:
You've gotta get 'em in the head; they go down quicker.
Well anyway, I'm relieving you of your duties. I've proved that I can read, and now I'm back on the job!
Now?  Well, I-ee uh... I think I'll get in the bathtub, and then curl up with a good book.
